name: Boxxy Bros.
description:
Made in 12 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Made by the Inexperienced VuVuu Inc. Duo-Squadron, 1 Artist (KaeGore)  and 1 coder/musicianist (Teritian)

All Code, Art, and Music was made during the Jam, Sound effects were snatched elsewhere.  A Video of the Process will be uploaded within the next few days to the VuVuu Inc YouTube Channel.

The Theme was Joined Together, we took that in the literal sense of two characters being tethered to each other.  One of the characters gets controlled by the player, while the other flings its self around on the chain acting as a wrecking ball, to do damage to the ever-spawning slimes.  

Try to get the highest score, there isn't an actual scoreboard, because we don't know how to do that, but yeah :)

The game is a very simple idea, that could be expanded upon in the future to be a little more complex.

Thanks for playing!
